title: (SO) consultancy in template deployement and simplification discussions
description:
Description
SO consultancy in template deployement and simplification discussions
  Concept to support:
Vendor (juniper) has vendor templates that we can use and feed with attributes. NC is decided to have this job. possibility to moove from and to end service api orchestration based on datamopdell to template orchestration
  as there is an ongoing product discussion we need to support on the simplificatoin discussions;
examine template deploymeent possibilities
examine what are the prerequisits if we have ned to end fetures and directly deployed templates
  there is a chance that the function of NC will change from end to end API driven deployement based on datamodel sructure on API --> Blueprint automated vendor template orchestration
 to investigate:
is it posssible to abstract somehow the new "blueprint" vendor templates to CFS?
how to handle Blueprint Vendor CFS in NC layer (how to push / catalog etc)
